name: Oroluk
desc: One of the staff at the Natlan Fishing Association.

value.text:
People of the Springs
Natlan Fishing Association

customize.name: Formula: Spinelgrain Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Spinelgrain Bait.

customize.name: Formula: Emberglow Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Emberglow Bait.

customize.name: Flowhorn Flounderfinder
customize.desc:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Natlan.
A specialty rod of the Natlan Fishing Association. Crafted from weapons-grade metal, it has also been carved with a fine design that features Long-Necked Rhinos and Flowcurrent Birds, ensuring both durability and style.
Anglers often speculate that, if only it felt inclined to harness the potential of its exceedingly long neck, the Long-Necked Rhino might become the most gifted fisher in the entire natural world. Meanwhile, the seemingly clumsy Flowcurrent Bird actually has to rely upon catching fish to survive. Together, therefore, they would make the perfect fishing partners â€” thus, having them both on the same rod is believed to bring anglers exceptional luck!

customize.name: Fishing Line Stabilizer
customize.desc:
A self-adaptive tension stabilizer that can be installed on a fishing rod to facilitate fishing. The device can automatically detect and record how hard different fish struggle. The more data it collects, the better the stabilizer works.

The device's prototype was the pointless invention of a Fontaine inventor that drew little interest for the longest time until the Fontaine Fishing Association discovered it and modified the product into the fishing line stabilizer used today. When the device first came out, it was most warmly received by the Association members, and now it has gradually been promoted in other regions.

It is an exceptionally hot commodity in the Snezhnayan market. Word has it that one of the Lord Harbingers is particularly fond of the product, which explains the hype.
